page.title: 06SLEAFORD FOX HUNTING
page.content: IN SLEAFORD THE FOX HUNTING SEASON STARTS IN SEPTEMBER WITH CUB HUNTING,THIS CONTINUES THROUGH TO OCTOBER.IN NOVEMBER THE FOX HUNTING STARTS AND THIS CARRIES ON THROUGH DECEMBER,JANUARY,FEBRUARY AND PART OF MARCH,IF THE GROUND IS NOT TOO WET. EVERY YEAR ON BOXING DAY THE BLANKNEY HUNT MEET IN THE MARKET PLACE IN SLEAFORD.THEY HUNT THROUGH THE LOCAL WOODS ALONG THE A17 AND THEN CARRY ON TO WOODS IN THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES.THE BELVOIR HUNT ALSO DOES A SMALL AMOUNT OF HUNTING IN THE SLEAFORD AREA.TO HUNT IN THIS AREA WITH A PACK OF HOUNDS RUN BY A MASTER OF FENLANDS ASSOCIATION YOU MUST BELONG TO THE LOCAL HUNT AND PAY SUBSCRIPTIONS. {BY HELEN KIRCHEN (AGE 15)}
